藏.definition: storehouse; depository; Buddhist or Taoist scripture

藏匿.definition: to cover up; to conceal; to go into hiding

藏品.definition: museum piece; collector's item; precious object

藏器待時.definition: to conceal one's abilities and wait (idiom); to lie low and await the opportune moment

藏垢納污.definition: to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing; aiding and abetting wicked deeds

藏拙.definition: avoiding doing something that one is clumsy at to save face

藏掖.definition: to try to cover up; hiding place

藏文.definition: Tibetan script; Tibetan written language; Tibetan language

藏污納垢.definition: to hide dirt, to conceal corruption (idiom); to shelter evil people and accept wrongdoing; aiding and abetting wicked deeds

藏獨.definition: Tibetan Independence (movement); abbr. for 西藏獨立運動|西藏独立运动

藏經洞.definition: cave holding scripture depository, part of Mogao cave complex 莫高窟, Dunhuang 敦煌

藏象.definition: hidden inner properties and their external manifestations (TCM)

藏身.definition: to hide; to go into hiding; to take refuge

藏鏡人.definition: man behind the mirror; puppet master; string puller

藏雀.definition: (bird species of China) Tibetan rosefinch (Carpodacus roborowskii)

藏雪雀.definition: (bird species of China) Tibetan snowfinch (Montifringilla henrici)

藏雪雞.definition: (bird species of China) Tibetan snowcock (Tetraogallus tibetanus)

藏頭露尾.definition: to hide the head and show the tail (idiom); to give a partial account; half-truths

藏馬雞.definition: (bird species of China) Tibetan eared pheasant (Crossoptilon harmani)

藏鵐.definition: (bird species of China) Tibetan bunting (Emberiza koslowi)

藏黃雀.definition: (bird species of China) Tibetan serin (Spinus thibetanus)

藏龍臥虎.definition: lit. hidden dragon, crouching tiger (idiom); fig. talented individuals in hiding; concealed talent
